/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -lboost_system -DBOOST_SYSTEM_NO_DEPRECATED -fpermissive -std=c++11 -g -O0  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/MsgEmitter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/MsgReceiver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/ReferenceMessage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/TimedBlock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/Timer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/thread_initial_unit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/multi_thread_app.dir/thread_terminal_unit.cpp.o  -o multi_thread_app -lboost_program_options -lboost_thread -lboost_chrono -lboost_system -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread
